# PageMint Starter Pack - Template Files

Thank you for purchasing the PageMint Starter Pack! ðŸŽ‰

## What's Included:
- Minimalist Clean Template (HTML + CSS + Assets)
- Gradient Startup Template (HTML + CSS + Assets) 
- Setup & Customization Guide
- Premium Icons & Graphics
- Font Files & License

## File Structure:
/minimalist-clean/
  - index.html (Main template)
  - style.css (TailwindCSS compiled)
  - /assets/ (Images, icons, fonts)
  - readme.md (Template-specific guide)

/gradient-startup/
  - index.html (Main template)
  - style.css (TailwindCSS compiled)
  - /assets/ (Images, icons, fonts)
  - readme.md (Template-specific guide)

/shared-assets/
  - /icons/ (Premium icon set)
  - /fonts/ (Manrope, Inter, Space Grotesk)
  - /graphics/ (Background patterns, shapes)

## Quick Start:
1. Extract all files to your project folder
2. Open any template's index.html in your browser
3. Customize colors using CSS variables
4. Replace placeholder content with your own
5. Deploy to your hosting platform

## Customization:
- Colors: Edit CSS variables at the top of style.css
- Content: Update text directly in index.html
- Images: Replace files in /assets/images/
- Fonts: Already included and configured

## License:
Personal use only. Cannot be used for commercial projects or client work.
Perfect for portfolios, learning projects, and personal websites.

## Support:
- Email: support@pagemint.com
- Documentation: https://pagemint.com/docs
- FAQ: https://pagemint.com/faq

## Tips:
- Test on mobile devices before deploying
- Use the included SEO meta tags
- Optimize images for faster loading
- Consider adding Google Analytics
